about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS GAME

■ Interface and screen
Marginal Break is a retro turn-based command JRPG. It has 2D graphics and a side-view battle screen divided into 6 zones, where you control silhouette characters to fight. The story and world view are dramatic with an emphasis on reality, and the narrative progresses in a visual novel format. In fields and dungeons, we have eliminated the troublesome map movement of looking for enemies.

■ Theme and Story
You will become one of the adventurers called breakers, and you will carry out various missions, from small requests for citizens to matters related to the survival of the nation. In it, I get to know people from all over the world, come into contact with them, and learn about their pain, sorrow, and anger. And finally, in this game, you can rewrite the complex and intricate fantasy world to the ending you want.

■ View of the world
The world view of Marginal Break is divided into , the monsters that inhabit it, and human civilization. Within civilization, kingdoms and nations that have begun to forget the threat of monsters have started conflicts, and people will not stop fighting even if the terrible destruction progresses. Catastrophe will happen if you don't make your way and lead the world in a better direction.

content_descriptors.notes: No direct description. However, it deals with all forms of violence and death, sexual violence, prejudice in a medieval world, authoritarian rule, slavery, sex industry, etc. and may not be suitable for viewing in the workplace.
